        public static final java.lang.String SATURATION_BASED_HUE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SATURATION_BASED_HYPER_HUE

        public static final java.lang.String SATURATION_BASED_HYPER_HUE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • batchParallelism

        public int batchParallelism
        Number of images processed in parallel in batch mode.

      • batchMode

        public boolean batchMode
        Enable batch mode. In batch mode input file must be a list of path to images, one in every line.

      • bins

        public int bins
        Number of bins used by Otsu's method.

      • bufferedInput

        public java.lang.Boolean bufferedInput
        Buffer input image in memory.

      • bufferedOutput

        public java.lang.Boolean bufferedOutput
        Buffer output image in memory.

      • clusteringAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String clusteringAlgorithm
        Specify the clustering algorithm. Valid values: isodata, k-means, otsu, and otsu-circular. Default: kMeans with elbow.

      • elbow

        public java.lang.Boolean elbow
        Use the elbow method

      • errorLimit

        public double errorLimit
        Elbow of the curve, as used by the elbow method and k-means. Default value is 0.95.

      • helpRequested

        public boolean helpRequested
        Display a help message.

      • imageTransforms

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> imageTransforms
        List of image transformations to perform before clustering. Valid values are: hue, hyper-hue, intensity, normalize-deviation(sigma), normalize-min-max , normalized-difference-vegetation-index, normalized-hyper-hue(max-zero) , select(channel,...), hue-hyper-hue.

      • initialCentersKDTree

        public java.lang.Boolean initialCentersKDTree
        Use kd-tree nodes as initial cluster centers.

      • initialCentersMean

        public java.lang.Boolean initialCentersMean
        Use mean as initial cluster centers.

      • initialCentersRandom

        public int initialCentersRandom
        Use this many random points as initial cluster centers.

      • inputFile

        public java.lang.String inputFile
        Input image file.

      • logFile

        public java.lang.String logFile
        Log file.

      • mask

        public java.lang.String mask
        Comma-separated list of coordinates. 4 for every half-plane.

      • maxClusters

        public int maxClusters
        Maximum number of clusters.

      • maxIterations

        public int maxIterations
        Maximum number of iterations k-means and isodata goes through.

      • minClusters

        public int minClusters
        Minimum number of clusters.

      • outputFormat

        public java.lang.String outputFormat
        Format name for the output image.

      • outputFile

        public java.lang.String outputFile
        Output image file.

      • rgbClusterColors

        public java.lang.Boolean rgbClusterColors
        Use different hues for clusters in the result.

      • replaceEmptyClustersFarthest

        public java.lang.Boolean replaceEmptyClustersFarthest
        Replace empty clusters by a point farthest from all clusters.

      • replaceEmptyClustersRandom

        public int replaceEmptyClustersRandom
        Use this many random points as replacement clusters.

      • saturationBased

        public java.lang.String saturationBased
        Use saturation based clustering. Valid values: hue, hyper-hue.

      • threads

        public java.lang.Integer threads
        Number of threads used.

      • theta_N

        public double theta_N
        A cluster is dropped if its size is lower then the theta_L percentage of all points. (Default value is 0.05)

      • L

        public int L
        The maximum number of cluster merged in lumping phase. (Default value is 3)

      • lumping

        public double lumping
        Cluster centers are merged if their distance is lower then lumping parameter. (Default value is 3)

      • std_deviation

        public double std_deviation
        Clusters are divided if its std deviation is larger then this value. (Default value is 5)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CmdLineConfig

        public CmdLineConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultValues

        public void setDefaultValues()
        Sets the default values for options not specified by the user.
